question: Which of these two supplements should i buy? Advice needed!?
question_content:
Hi there,i am stuck between buying two supplements and i need some adivce on which one to get!
Please consider: Ingredients,price and size it comes in.

http://www.evolutionnutrition.co.uk/protein-mrps/olimp-whey-protein-complex-100-163-10-189.php

http://www.evolutionnutrition.co.uk/protein-mrps/cytosport-monster-mass-124-10-134.php

answers.answer_content:
Youd be better with the pure whey protein, only if your training hard though (exhuasting your muscles completely), otherwise you wont need it.
For the first year of bodybuilding you wont need to go near a supplement for extra protein, its for people who need extra protein for building muscle.
Mass gainers are just full of carbs and will only add fat if you already add fat easily, and if your skinny and naturally ectomorphic, youll simply just pee it out and it will do nothing for you.
If you really want protein suplements though, check out http://www.discount-supplements.co.uk/
They have great protein (over 2kg) for about £25 plus you get free creatine on offer with it right now.
Failing that nutri1st products in tescos are fantastic, especially the advanced power formuala for £30 which has BCAA's, HMB, added creatine, glutamine etc.

If you want my honest opinion supplements are a complete waste of money. My husband used the GOMAD diet for a year while doing stronglifts and he went from a weak 8st to a massive 15st but still has a flat stomach. This is all from adding whole fat milk to his diet. I have seen the results with my own eyes and whole milk is all you need for 'bulking' if that is your goal. Alternatively if you are trying to get 'ripped' then give BurnYourFlab.com a go - I swear by it! x
